ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Wow...
ygData.msgSnippet: id just like to make a suggestion, to a lot of us that use outlook, the message view area is small... With this new banner junk at the top, i cant see you
ygData.messageBody:
id just like to make a suggestion, to a lot of us that use outlook, the
message view area is small... With this new banner junk at the top, i cant
see you posts if you reply AFTER someone else... so perhaps you could please
reply BEFORE someone's post when you do.. like i am doing now :)


----- Original Message -----
From: Gordon Hughes <ghughes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 12, 2000 2:27 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Wow...


>
> >
> Ok and hmm replying to my own message, all of a sudden the sponsor stuff
is
> at the top of my emails. Is this a change or is it cuz i upgraded to
> Outlook 2000? If its the latter, anyone know how to fix it?
> >
>
> Annoying, isn't it? :(
>
> You'll just have to put up with it like the rest of us, I'm afraid. I
think
> it's more to do with egroups than with your mail client. I use Outlook
'98
> and it's the same.
>
> On the bright side, you learn to ignore it after a while.
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
